location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1428 from William Henry Wathen, Secretary to Government, Bombay to Assistant in Charge of the Residency in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is in response to a letter dated 18 July, no. 30, which transmitted a copy of a letter to the Acting Governor of Muscat communicating the news of the British Government regarding the disputes rising between his Highness the Imaum [Imam, Sa‘īd bin Sulṭān Āl Sa‘īd] and his neighbours. It states that the Right Honourable the Governor in Council, John Fitzgibbon, approved of his proceedings.
